abstract: Carl C. Icahn said on Wednesday that he would go ahead with his proxy battle with Motorola despite the mobile phone maker’s having given into his demands to split up the company.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn said on Wednesday that he would go ahead with his proxy battle with Motorola despite the mobile phone maker’s having given into his demands to split up the company.

headline.main: Icahn Forges Ahead With Motorola Proxy Battle
